sentences: NORWAY and AUSTRALIA identified the need to consider legal issues and, with NEW ZEALAND, stressed synergies between the AWG-KP and AWG-LCA.
NORWAY said the work of the two AWGs forms the basis of a comprehensive package in Copenhagen and supported joint meetings.
NEW ZEALAND proposed that a Committee of the Whole or similar body be created in 2009.
CHINA opposed any major revision to how the AWG-KP and AWG-LCA conduct their work.
